definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing
a speech/to speak/to talk/to address/CL:個|个[ge4]
to talk about/to narrate/to give an account
to pay particular attention to/carefully selected for quality/tastefully chosen
to stress/to emphasize/particular about sth/to strive for
to give a lecture/to lecture on

sentences.english: I just wanted to write down everything the professor said and memorize it.
sentences.chinese: 我就是把教授讲的话原原本本纪录下来然后记住。

sentences.english: I am speaking English but you are acting like sheep, only looking wide-eyed.
sentences.chinese: 我讲的是英语，但你表现的像只绵羊，只是睁大眼睛。

sentences.english: I couldn't remember a story to tell the children. , so I .
sentences.chinese: 我想不起来故事给孩子们讲，所以，我编了一个。

sentences.english: Maaike tells me about her life. I am soon jealous.
sentences.chinese: 玛艾克则给我讲了她的生活，我听着听着就嫉妒了。

sentences.english: Speak, write, pray, and love the children entrusted to me.
sentences.chinese: 讲说，写信，祈祷，爱所有信任我的孩子。

sentences.english: Firstly, poetry is the product of combining poetry and music from the origin.
sentences.chinese: 第一，诗歌从本源上讲是诗乐结合的产物。

sentences.english: In theory, to issue exchangeable bonds on the market is good.
sentences.chinese: 从理论上讲，在市场上发行可转换债券是好的。

sentences.english: Who was it said that good could not come out of evil ?
sentences.chinese: 恶行生不出善果来，是谁讲过这句话来着？

sentences.english: The landlord aunt is always telling me much information about the Xinkai River.
sentences.chinese: 房东大娘总是会跟我讲关于新开河的见闻。

sentences.english: In theory, it is possible to also use Sandcastle to produce help files for .
sentences.chinese: 从理论上讲，它可以同时使用沙堡帮助文件制作的。

sentences.english: The auctioneer's services are paid for in the form of …
sentences.chinese: 提示了这一段讲的是拍卖人所得的利润。

sentences.english: Li told him there were two ways to resolve the situation, Chen said.
sentences.chinese: 李刚讲解决问题有两条路，陈广干说。

sentences.english: This is the hardest story that I've ever told.
sentences.chinese: 这是我曾讲过的最艰难的故事。

sentences.english: The other day a colleague commented that he enjoyed listening to my musical efforts.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，有个同事说他喜欢听我讲为音乐付出的努力。

sentences.english: Most Asians also speak English and Swahili .
sentences.chinese: 大多数亚洲人也讲英语和斯瓦希里语。

sentences.english: On the one hand, I can see that this is a pretty cool gadget.
sentences.chinese: 从这方面讲，我认为它是一个相当出色的小把戏。

definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages
(literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to refer to
